definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: Now instead of coniferous forests there are just carbonized remains of trees and voids.
sentences.chinese: 現在沒有了針葉林，只有碳化的樹木和空洞依然存在。

sentences.english: About half a are reindeer herders up in the Taiga mountains.
sentences.chinese: 大約一半的人在針葉林山上放牧馴鹿。

sentences.english: Broadleaved forest may offer more SOC than coniferous forest.
sentences.chinese: 因此，闊葉林比針葉林能積累更多的土壤有機碳。

sentences.english: Sublimation from snow surface in southern mountain taiga of eastern Siberia.
sentences.chinese: 東西伯利亞南部山脈針葉林帶雪表面的昇華。

sentences.english: Roughly the size of India, it's capped by a thick layer of permafrost and swathed in dense taiga forest.
sentences.chinese: 粗廣的印度覆蓋稀薄的凍土和寬帶狀濃密的原針葉林。

sentences.english: Broad-leaved forest improvement soil physics properties ability is stronger than coniferous forest.
sentences.chinese: 闊葉林改善土壤物理性狀的能力較針葉林強。

sentences.english: This one is just a meandering in the woods path.
sentences.chinese: 這是在針葉林中蜿蜒的小路。
